name: event-management-platform
description: Comprehensive event management platform with registration, attendance tracking, and certification features

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=shared
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
